p: Over 8228 person-day follow-up (PDFU), 174 patients died in hospital. The Kaplan Meir probability of in-hospital death by 14 days was of 29.5% (IQR: 25.5–34.0) ( Figure 2 A). The 14-day probability of death was associated with age, being 0% in patients below 40, and highest in those above 80 (52.0%, 95%CI: 43.1–61.6) ( Figure 2B).
